alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 29 at 4:21PM EDT until April 29 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN BREVARD COUNTY... At 421 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Titusville Airport, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Port Saint John, Mims, Titusville Airport and Playalinda Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
